LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice.label: Solar Juice
LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice.descr: A chemical addiction to Solar Juice.\nWithout regular doses of Solar Juice the body may experience pain, a lower state of conciusness, impaired movement, reduced sight, low blood pressure and reduced hand-eye coordination.
LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.label: Helianto
LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.descrip: In order for a Miho to not have animalistic sensations, it is necessary to periodically take a drug made from helianto. For humans it's just another drug to escape reality, pathetic!
